actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend to church plans the exemption from unrelated business tax for debt-financed property held by pension plans.
short_title: Church Plan Investment Fairness Act of 2005

summary.text: Church Plan Investment Fairness Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt church retirement income accounts from the tax on unrelated debt-financed income.

titles.title: Church Plan Investment Fairness Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend to church plans the exemption from unrelated business tax for debt-financed property held by pension plans.
